text: The Blizzard () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Basov.Вдова Олега Видова: «Он устал от лжи, от системы, от кинобюрократов»МЕТЕЛЬ (1964) It stars Valentina Titova, Oleg Vidov, and Georgy Martyniuk. The movie is based on the 1831 story "The Blizzard" from The Tales of the Late Ivan Petrovich Belkin by Alexander Pushkin. ==Actors== * Valentina Titova - Maria Gavrilovna * Oleg Vidov - Vladimir * Georgy Martyniuk - Burmin * Mariya Pastukhova - Praskovya Petrovna * Sergei Papov - Gavrila Gavrilovich * Nina Vilvovskaya - Maid == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Basov
